mapper.insert: INSERT INTO playlist(user_id, name, playlist_type, system_code, is_deleted, track_count, sort_no, rules) VALUES(#{userId}, #{name}, #{playlistType}, #{systemCode}, #{isDeleted}, #{trackCount}, #{sortNo}, #{rules})

INSERT INTO playlist(user_id, name, playlist_type, system_code, is_deleted, track_count, sort_no) SELECT #{userId}, #{name}, 'SYSTEM', #{systemCode}, 0, 0, 0 WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM playlist WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND system_code = #{systemCode} AND is_deleted = 0)
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, name, playlist_type, system_code, sort_no, is_deleted, track_count, rules, created_at, updated_at FROM playlist WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = 0

SELECT id, user_id, name, playlist_type, system_code, sort_no, is_deleted, track_count, rules, created_at, updated_at FROM playlist WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND system_code = #{systemCode} AND is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 1

SELECT id, user_id, name, playlist_type, system_code, sort_no, is_deleted, track_count, rules, created_at, updated_at FROM playlist WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY CASE WHEN playlist_type = 'SYSTEM' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, sort_no ASC, updated_at DESC, id DESC
SELECT id FROM playlist WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY CASE WHEN playlist_type = 'SYSTEM' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, sort_no ASC, id ASC
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(sort_no), 0) FROM playlist WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = 0 AND playlist_type = 'NORMAL'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM playlist WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND name = #{name} AND is_deleted = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE playlist SET name = #{name}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = 0 AND playlist_type = 'NORMAL'
UPDATE playlist SET is_deleted = 1, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = 0 AND playlist_type = 'NORMAL'
UPDATE playlist SET sort_no = #{sortNo}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = 0 AND playlist_type = 'NORMAL'
UPDATE playlist SET updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0

UPDATE playlist p SET p.track_count = ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM playlist_track pt INNER JOIN track t ON t.id = pt.track_id WHERE pt.playlist_id = #{playlistId} AND t.is_deleted = 0 ), p.updated_at = NOW() WHERE p.id = #{playlistId} AND p.is_deleted = 0

UPDATE playlist p SET p.track_count = ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM playlist_track pt INNER JOIN track t ON t.id = pt.track_id WHERE pt.playlist_id = p.id AND t.is_deleted = 0 ), p.updated_at = NOW() WHERE p.is_deleted = 0
